title: Player behaivour
body: Once again school holidays roll around, and prove that Riot is doing absolutely nothing about the insane level of toxicity, trolls, intentional feeders, and afks on this server. Granted it's only twelvies doing this kind of crap, but why are they still here? I've had 2 promo series in a row ruined by afks, and not just one afk, every promo game at least 2 afks, shit's getting old, not that that's the major issue here, but still.
